body.name: [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger, 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Lightning Cable Apple Charging Fast High Speed USB Compatible 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8-multicolor

features: ✿【iPhone Charger Fast Charging】: iPhone charger cable is made of high-purity copper core and intelligent chip, with overcharge protection, stable current protection, automatic switching, and battery protection, and can support up to 2.4A fast charging and 480 Mbps transfer speed.

✿【Apple MFi Certified】: Manufactured with Apple chips, the Lightning cable fully supports iOS versions and all future updates. They are certified for high quality, tensile strength, fast charging, and 480Mbps transfer speed, ensuring full charge and sync compatibility with your iPhone devices.

✿【Delightful Length&Superior Durability】6 colorful Apple MFi-certified iPhone charging cable, 3/3/6/6/6/10 feet various lengths, feel free to choose where to charge. iPhone charging cable with reinforced joint designs that have passed many times bending tests for extra protection and durability.

✿【iPhone Perfect Compatibility】: iPhone charger cable MFi certified to ensure a full charge and compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8 Plus/8/7 Plus /7/Sync 6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6/5s/5c/5/Air 2/mini/mini 2/mini 4 etc.

✿【High Quality, High Service】: Apple MFi certified 6 iPhone charging cable, 3/3/6/6/6/10 feet various lengths, convenient to charge your device in bedroom, sofa, office, back seat of car, travel, if you have any product questions, please get in touch with us anytime. Our service team will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Strong and Durable Our cable is use of superior materials - TPE material, which is durable and not easy to tangle. The most flexible, powerful and skin-friendly material, will not easy to damage when folded, pulled, bent. Fast Charging&High Speed Transmission High-quality thick copper wire enhance charging and data transfer speed of the chargers. The transmission speed is up to 480 mb/s and maximum charging speed up to 2.4A. It's not only fast but also safe. Soft & Smooth & Colorful The lightning cables are designed with fashionable colors. Made of soft and smooth TPE colorful material, not only more durable and wear-resistant, but also brings you a wonderful visual experience and adds color to your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars multiple sizes and very good quality
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has been asking for a long iPhone charger, and I needed some for the car as well. I found this package with multiple chargers and they come in 3 different sizes, but best of all they also come in different colors and they are a very cute pastel colors that my daughters really like. I have had some bad luck with chargers as I usually go with a 3rd party not apple because they are more expensive, but this chargers are MiFi certified and they work perfectly. My kids love their new chargers and they now have extras to place in different areas of the hose so they can keep their phones charged at all times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are awesome! It’s nice to have different colors and sizes especially if you have several iPhone users in your home. They’re thick and sturdy and the little package they come in makes it easy to store them without getting tangled. Definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got these for like ten bucks for all six charger cables, which i think is a great deal, i was half expecting them not to last very long but happy to say they've been working perfectly for months! Love that they come in different lenghts, the longest one is awesome for the bedside table which is what i wanted, and love that they all have different colors so that we can easily identify who they belong to, they are sturdy and don’t seem flimsy at all like others we've bought in the past, would recomend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that it comes in different sizes - i bought these middle of July and didn’t use them until middle of august / beginning of September. I got them more so for spares and i needed a long one for when i went to the hospital to deliver my baby. I just recently started using the purple one (i think it’s 6 ft) it doesn’t work properly. You have to fidget with it and it doesn’t always continue to charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable charging cords, variety of colors and lengths
reviews.reviewText: I had planned to include pictures with this review but it is rather hard to take a picture of something that has disappeared. Granddaughter, her husband and their three kids visited soon after these arrived. Nosey great-grands found them and promptly confiscated my new cords. They all needed a new charging cord and this left me with only one. But they wanted a spare so there went the last one. They were “discussing” (arguing) about who would end up with the longest cord. Oh well, I will just get more. These appeared to be durable enough to stand up to the abuse they will get from those super-active youngsters. And they did seem to like the different colors. All in all they were well pleased with their find.I just figure these made an inexpensive gift for the kids. Maybe I will get 2 sets so I will have plenty to “find” on a visit later this year. But great set of charger cords at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast charging and nice assortment!
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are definitely made durably. I also like the different lengths do I can use them in different places. The multicolors are convenient so that we know whose charger belongs to whom! These cords charge all my devices very quickly. Item works well and is good quality. Would buy again as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok, not great
reviews.reviewText: The first cable I used didn’t last long. Now on my second cable and so far it’s working, but for how long? I think they will last as long as you don’t manually handle it too often. If you plug into your phone and leave it alone, you shouldn’t have any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Teh charger gets the job done, but does not seem to charge very quickly. It also seems cheaply made, but it was a cheap price, so that makes sense.
